description:
In this course (House Plan in AutoCAD (Full project - From A to Z)), the trainer Bassel will teach you, step by step, how to draw a house using advanced techniques which give you the effortlessness, the speediness and the proficiency in drawing process.
Master house planning step by step with a full house plan project.
This course will equip you with the knowledge and the techniques needed in house plan process. At the end of this course, you will be able to draw effortlessly and speedily a house (including walls, doors, windows, texts, hatch and dimensions … ). Furthermore, you will be able to solve the most common problems you may face throughout house drawing process.
This course is designed for students who are already familiar with AutoCAD. To acquire the largest amount of knowledge, if you do NOT know anything in AutoCAD, you need a basics course before attending this course.

Now, I am working on additional lessons (Electrical Plan and Layout), so please keep following to get advantage of them.
title: House Plan in AutoCAD (Full project - From A to Z)
